description: Multilingual Translation Services Roster. The purpose of this Request for Supplier Qualification is to solicit proposals for global translation services providers who can assist the CTC in translating various documents from and into any and all of the following languages...

full_summary:
### Multilingual Translation Services Roster

#### Reference Number:
PW-22-01005923

#### Amendment Number:
1

#### Solicitation Number:
DC-2022-PO-05

#### Publication Date:
August 31, 2022

#### Tender Closing Date:
September 26, 2022 5:00:00 PM

#### Amendment Date:
September 16, 2022

#### Expected Contract Start Date:
To be determined

#### Expected Contract End Date:
To be determined

#### Tender Status:
Expired

#### Notice Type:
Invitation to Qualify

#### Procurement Method:
Competitive – Open bidding

#### Selection Criteria:
Not specified

#### Trade Agreements:
The tender is open to proponents from countries participating in the following trade agreements:

* Quebec-New Brunswick Procurement Agreement (QNB PA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (CUSFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Atlantic Procurement Agreement (APA)
* Ontario-Quebec Trade and Cooperation Agreement (OQTCA)
* General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

#### Regions of Opportunity:
Worldwide

#### Regions of Delivery:
Canada

#### Contact Information:
*Name: Paulina Orozco
*Email: procurement@destinationcanada.com
*Attachments:
	+ [Multilingual Translation Services Roster](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/31/6a87fd374063324e06205fbc5fbaa23b/dc-2022-po-05_rfsq_multilingual_translation_services_roster.pdf)
	+ [Multilingual Translation Services Roster – Amendment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/16/398dd025bf0/8a4ce47be5493f56278c/dc-2022-po-05_multilingual_translation_services_roster_addendum_1.pdf) 

Destination Canada invites proponents to submit their qualifications and proposals for the provision of multilingual translation services. The services encompass the translation of various documents from and into multiple languages, including English, French, Spanish, German, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and others.

### Notice of Tender

Destination Canada intends to develop a list
